title: A Thanksgiving Dealmaking Sprint Helped Netflix Win Warner Bros.
description: The Netflix Inc. plans that clinched the deal for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. started to shape up around Thanksgiving.
content: The Netflix Inc. plans that clinched the deal for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. started to shape up around Thanksgiving.
